topic.b_exp: A clean, light and reliable password manager that is safe to use and works flawlessly.

news.header: pwManager's official release date is announced!
news.p1: The official release date is scheduled to be on May 5th!
news.p2: The day of the coolest projects

news.header: pwManager will be presented at the coolest projects!
news.p1: If you want to go and see this masterpiece at the coolest projects, you can go to the RDS Main Hall, Dublin, Ireland on May 5th, 2019!
news.p2: Go to the website section to try find it.

whr.desc: pwManager is free, safe to use, and works flawlessly.
The loyalty membership is honored to people who the creator knows or the people who assisted in creating this. Want to see if you are eligible? Go to the contact page to send me an email.
